#######################   test forward unit, MEM & EX all write to rd
# add x1, x1, x2
# 0000000 x2 x1 000 x1 0110011
00000000
00100000
10000000
10110011
# add x1, x1, x3
# 0000000 x3 x1 000 x1 0110011
00000000
00110000
10000000
10110011
# add x1, x1, x4
# 0000000 x4 x1 000 x1 0110011
00000000
01000000
10000000
10110011
# end of instruction
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
